Description:
Detects execution of "reg.exe" commands with the "delete" flag on safe boot registry keys. Often used by attacker to prevent safeboot execution of security products

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: SafeBoot Registry Key Deleted Via Reg.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%reg.exe' and original_file_name = 'reg.exe') and (command like '% delete %' and command like '%\system\currentcontrolset\control\safeboot%'))
